name: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Polio vaccine

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at birth (polio-endemic country and high risk of spread)
action.description: Provide birth dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the zero dose recommendation at birth (until 2 weeks old) due to patient being in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread. Patient will continue the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth (up to 2 weeks old) and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at 6 weeks old
action.description: Provide 1st dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 14 weeks old
action.description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 14 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1 Dose given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1 Dose given at least 4 months ago
action.description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1 dose IPV given at least 4 months ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 2 Doses given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide 3rd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 2nd dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 8 weeks old
action.description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 8 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide 1st dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1st Dose (Second dose in 3-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago
action.description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose bOPV (Second dose in 3-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 2nd Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide 3rd dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 2nd dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scneario)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1st Dose (Third dose in 4-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago
action.description: Provide 4th dose Polio (bOPV) vaccination – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose bOPV (Third dose in 4-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - No Doses
action.description: Provide 1st dose Polio (IPV) vaccination – using the "IPV Only" schedule

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 2nd dose
action.description: Provide 2nd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 3rd dose
action.description: Provide 3rd dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 3rd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 4th dose (booster)
action.description: Provide 4th dose Polio (IPV) vaccination - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose (booster)
